title: Successful login for Management user with correct credentials
description: Verify that a Management user can log in successfully with valid email and password, and is directed to the Management dashboard with appropriate role-based access.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input valid Management user email and password
Click the login button
Confirm login is successful and user is redirected to Management dashboard
Verify the dashboard displays Management role-specific data and UI components

title: Successful login for Member user with correct credentials
description: Verify that a Member user can log in successfully with valid email and password, and is directed to the Member dashboard with appropriate role-based access.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input valid Member user email and password
Click the login button
Confirm login is successful and user is redirected to Member dashboard
Verify the dashboard displays Member role-specific data and UI components

title: Login failure with incorrect password
description: Verify the system prevents login with incorrect password and displays an appropriate error message.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input valid email with incorrect password
Click the login button
Confirm login is denied and error message related to invalid credentials is shown

title: Role-based access control enforcement on dashboard
description: Verify that Management users cannot access Member-only features and vice versa through UI navigation or direct URL access.

steps.description: Login as Management user
Attempt to access Member-specific dashboard pages via URL and menu
Confirm access is denied or redirected appropriately
Logout and login as Member user
Attempt to access Management-only dashboard pages via URL and menu
Confirm access is denied or redirected appropriately

title: Logout functionality
description: Verify that the user can successfully logout from the system and is redirected to the login page with session cleared.

steps.description: Login with valid credentials
Click the logout button or link
Confirm user session is invalidated
Verify redirection to login page
Attempt to navigate back to dashboard via browser
Confirm access is denied without login

title: Dashboard loads accurate statistics and requests for Management user
description: Verify Management dashboard shows correct and updated statistics, loan requests, asset statuses, transportation, and room reservation information.

steps.description: Login as Management user
Confirm dashboard displays accurate statistics about assets, loans, reservations, transportation
Verify loan requests list reflects all pending, approved, and rejected requests
Verify calendar and overview data is synchronized and up-to-date

title: Dashboard loads accurate statistics and requests for Member user
description: Verify Member dashboard shows accurate personal loan history, reservation statuses and transport booking summaries.

steps.description: Login as Member user
Confirm dashboard displays personal loan and booking summaries
Verify calendar shows member's relevant events and bookings

title: CRUD operations on Asset Product Templates
description: Verify Management can create, read, update, and delete product templates successfully, with validation and persistence.

steps.description: Login as Management user
Navigate to Asset Product Template management page
Create new product template with valid data and upload images
Confirm creation success and new template appears in list
Edit the template changing fields and images
Confirm update persistence and UI reflects changes
Delete the created product template
Confirm deletion success and template is removed from list

title: CRUD operations on individual Asset Units and QR code generation
description: Verify Management can add physical units under product templates, generate and scan QR codes, and delete units.

steps.description: Login as Management user
Create or select existing product template
Add new asset units with images and details
Confirm asset units saved and displayed with QR codes
Scan QR code using stock opname feature to verify unit detection
Confirm scanned unit data is accurate
Delete an asset unit and verify removal

title: Member asset borrowing request flow - success path
description: Verify a Member can successfully submit a borrow request for available asset units and receive approval notification.

steps.description: Login as Member user
Browse asset catalog and select available units
Submit borrow request with valid dates
Confirm request submission success message shown
Login as Management and approve the borrow request
Confirm Member receives approval notification
Member marks items as picked up and later returned
Verify loan history updated accordingly

title: Member asset borrowing request flow - rejection path
description: Verify borrowing request rejects if asset is unavailable or Management denies, and notification/error displayed to Member.

steps.description: Login as Member user
Attempt borrow request for asset units already loaned out or unavailable
Confirm system prevents duplicate or conflicting requests
Submit request; Management rejects request
Confirm Member receives rejection notification
Verify Member dashboard reflects rejection status

title: Room reservation creation with conflict detection
description: Verify Members can submit room reservation requests and system detects time slot conflicts preventing double bookings.

steps.description: Login as Member user
View available rooms and select a room
Submit reservation request for a specific time slot
Confirm request submission success for free slot
Attempt to submit overlapping reservation request for the same room and time slot
Confirm system rejects reservation due to conflict with an error message

title: Room reservation approval and notification
description: Verify Management can approve or reject room reservation requests and Members get notified accordingly.

steps.description: Login as Management user
Review pending room reservation requests
Approve a valid reservation request
Confirm approval status updated and notification sent to Member
Reject invalid or conflicting reservation request
Confirm rejection status updated and notification sent to Member

title: Transportation booking creation and conflict validation
description: Verify Members can create transportation booking requests with required details and system checks for vehicle availability before accepting.

steps.description: Login as Member user
Fill transportation booking form with vehicle, date, time and destination
Submit booking request
Confirm request submission success if vehicle is free
Attempt booking overlapping with existing booking for the same vehicle
Confirm system rejects request due to unavailability

title: Transportation booking approval and notification
description: Verify Management can assign drivers, approve or reject transportation booking requests and Members receive status updates.

steps.description: Login as Management user
Review pending transportation requests
Assign driver and approve request
Confirm approval status and driver assignment saved
Confirm Member receives approval notification
Reject request for any valid reason
Confirm rejection status and notification sent to Member

title: User Management CRUD by Management users
description: Verify that Management users can add, edit, delete users, assign roles and permissions, and search users effectively.

steps.description: Login as Management user
Navigate to User Management module
Create a new user with valid role and privileges
Confirm user creation success and user visible in the list
Edit user details, roles and privileges
Confirm updates saved and reflected
Delete user and confirm removal
Verify user no longer present
Perform user search with keywords
Confirm search results correctly filtered

title: Password update functionality for users
description: Verify that Management users can update their own and other user passwords securely, with validation and confirmation.

steps.description: Login as Management user
Navigate to password update section for self and for another user
Update password using valid and invalid formats
Confirm strong password validation works
Confirm password update success and user can login with new password

title: Stock Opname inventory audit with QR scanning and reporting
description: Verify Management can conduct stock opname by scanning QR codes, manually entering items, recording conditions, detecting discrepancies, and generating reports.

steps.description: Login as Management user
Initiate new stock opname session
Scan multiple asset unit QR codes successfully
Manually enter asset codes and record item conditions
Confirm system detects and flags discrepancies with expected data
Finalize stock opname session
Confirm discrepancy report is generated and saved

title: Website Content Management - updating hero section and publishing
description: Verify Management can edit hero text, upload hero video, update schedules and pastor profiles, and publish changes to the public site successfully.

steps.description: Login as Management user
Navigate to Website Content Management module
Edit hero section text and upload a valid hero video
Confirm changes are saved and validated (media type and size)
Update worship schedules and pastor profile details
Publish updates to the public website
Confirm public website reflects all changes after publishing

title: API error handling for invalid input data on create asset
description: Verify API returns appropriate error codes and messages when invalid or missing fields are submitted during asset creation.

steps.description: Send asset creation request with missing mandatory fields
Confirm API responds with validation error code and descriptive message
Send asset creation request with invalid data format for fields
Confirm API responds with appropriate error details

title: Page loader animation displays during asynchronous data fetching
description: Verify that loader animation is shown on pages (dashboard, assets, rooms, transportation) while data is being fetched asynchronously and hides after load completion.

steps.description: Navigate to each major page with data fetch: Dashboard, Assets, Rooms, Transportation
Confirm loading animation is visible during data loading
Confirm loading animation disappears after data loads successfully

title: Client-side routing enforces role-based menu visibility
description: Verify that menu options and navigation links shown to the user correspond correctly to their assigned roles, and unauthorized links are hidden.

steps.description: Login as Management user
Confirm all Management menus visible and Member-only menus hidden
Logout and login as Member user
Confirm only Member menus are visible and Management menus hidden

title: Notification sent when requests status change
description: Verify that users receive notifications when asset loans, room reservations, or transportation bookings are approved or rejected.

steps.description: Member submits borrow, room reservation, and transportation booking requests
Management approves or rejects each request type
Confirm Member receives correct status update notifications for each request

title: Security enforcement: JWT authentication and role privilege checks
description: Verify all API endpoints enforce JWT token authentication and role-based access control, rejecting unauthorized requests.

steps.description: Send API requests with invalid or expired JWT tokens
Confirm API rejects requests with 401 Unauthorized or relevant error code
Send API requests for Management-only resources using Member user token
Confirm API enforces role privilege and rejects unauthorized access

title: Handling corrupted or invalid hero video uploads in CMS
description: Verify that uploading corrupted or unsupported formats of hero videos in Website CMS results in proper validation error and does not save invalid files.

steps.description: Login as Management user
Attempt to upload unsupported video file or corrupted media to hero section
Confirm system displays appropriate validation error
Confirm invalid file is not saved or published
